name: WeightlessSounds
0:
”Alexa open Weightless Sounds”
”Alexa ask Weightless Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: weightless sounds
des:
Experience the tranquil and ethereal sensation of floating in space with weightless sounds. These ambient tones will help you unwind, meditate, and escape the gravity of everyday life.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Weightless Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
